Sentencas: Ammonia (NH3) is a carbon-free Hydrogen carrier with the advantages of high volumetric energy density, developed infrastructure, as well as easy and safe storage.
Titulo: Coupling ammonia catalytic decomposition and electrochemical oxidation for solid oxide fuel cells: A model based on elementary reaction kinetics

Sentencas: The coupling of NH3 catalytic decomposition with electrochemical oxidation in an anode of solid oxide fuel cells leads to the field of direct Ammonia-fueled solid oxide fuel cell.
Titulo: Coupling ammonia catalytic decomposition and electrochemical oxidation for solid oxide fuel cells: A model based on elementary reaction kinetics

Sentencas: However, the related coupling mechanism needs clarification.
Titulo: Coupling ammonia catalytic decomposition and electrochemical oxidation for solid oxide fuel cells: A model based on elementary reaction kinetics

Sentencas: In the present study, by developing a mechanistic model and a library of elementary reaction kinetics, we attempt to have an overview on the synergism of heterogeneous reactions, charge-transfer reactions, bulk diffusion, and charge-transfer processes of direct Ammonia-fueled solid oxide fuel cell.
Titulo: Coupling ammonia catalytic decomposition and electrochemical oxidation for solid oxide fuel cells: A model based on elementary reaction kinetics

Sentencas: We describe charge-transfer reactions based on hydrogen spillover mechanism as well as oxygen spillover mechanism, and find that only the hydrogen spillover mechanism fits with experimental data.
Titulo: Coupling ammonia catalytic decomposition and electrochemical oxidation for solid oxide fuel cells: A model based on elementary reaction kinetics

Sentencas: With this validated model, we identify the rate-determining steps as well as the main surface species in H-2-fueled and NH3-fueled solid oxide fuel cells.
Titulo: Coupling ammonia catalytic decomposition and electrochemical oxidation for solid oxide fuel cells: A model based on elementary reaction kinetics

Sentencas: We define the region of NH3 catalytic decomposition and that of electrochemical oxidation to quantify the coupling within the anode.
Titulo: Coupling ammonia catalytic decomposition and electrochemical oxidation for solid oxide fuel cells: A model based on elementary reaction kinetics

Sentencas: Based on the quantification results, we study the effects of temperature and content of inlet NH3 on cell performance.
Titulo: Coupling ammonia catalytic decomposition and electrochemical oxidation for solid oxide fuel cells: A model based on elementary reaction kinetics
